Reviews.Title: Works Just As Intended
Reviews.Author: PhantomArcher "Tyler Moore"
Reviews.Content: These video balun connectors are the perfect solution for CCTV systems that use Cat5 cable. Cat5 used with these baluns is great for distances siamese cables are otherwise not practical to reach. The baluns are packaged in pairs, which is perfect, as the standard run will require two units. The pressure contact connectors make connections incredibly simple requiring minimal tools (only to strip the Cat5 conductor). No detectable losses or signal degradation when using these make them the most ideal balun to use.

Reviews.Title: Cheap baluns did the trick
Reviews.Author: igen "igen"
Reviews.Content: I couldn't believe what a ripoff the siamese cables were for my security cameras, so I bought these baluns and some other cheap power connectors that screw onto CAT5 wire the same way.  I ran the CAT5 cable, screwed the connectors onto each end, and plugged everything in.  They did the trick, and the picture quality seems about just as good as with the old Siamese cable.

Reviews.Title: Works Perfectly
Reviews.Author: Regan222
Reviews.Content: I have currently 4 high quality cameras (700 TVL) running to a DVR and all are connected via these balun.  The picture is excellent.  I am able to use much less expensive cable and still have excellent images.  No noise or interference and they are VERY easy to install.  I recommend them heartily.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Diego Reina
Reviews.Content: I bought several couplers impedance models and I always bring a problem of false contacts or pictures with stripes, and this product is very good because of all I went to purchase any problems, very good image without interference

Reviews.Title: flexible connection is best
Reviews.Author: Epcuser
Reviews.Content: works  great and when connecting to back of DVR the flexible cable makes it easy to setup price is great.

Reviews.Title: Makes an install easy
Reviews.Author: Joe Hyland
Reviews.Content: Running CAT5 cable just makes more since. The adapters fit my needs as I am sure they would yours.Eaiser to pull and with my connector tool a snap..Cost of CAT5 is cheaper also,,Bonus..

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Mel Weeks
Reviews.Content: They work great for analog transmission. Time will tell on how they will last, but confident they'll be fine. Small and compact.

Reviews.Title: execllent
Reviews.Author: Darrell
Reviews.Content: Works perfect for installation of my cctv systems  i dont install with out them, makes job that much easier and neat

Reviews.Title: All is Ok
Reviews.Author: Franklyn Blanco "Cur Job"
Reviews.Content: This product is for my satisfaction, is what I was expecting many thanks. Everything is perfect. I can recommend without problem

Reviews.Title: 12x Camera CCTV BNC CAT5
Reviews.Author: Maurice H. Nelson
Reviews.Content: Item used for surveillance system and it works like it was made to do, would recommend this product to anyone needing added hardware to their system.

Reviews.Title: 12x camera CCTV Baluns
Reviews.Author: viper1m
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping and good quality. I have bought it & used it before and, real happy withthe product. so decided to buy another set.

Reviews.Title: Great product, fast shipping
Reviews.Author: joel "JAZZY JOEL PRODUCTIONS "Quality eve...
Reviews.Content: quality, fast, will order again /// pro awesome super fast shipping great price to quality ratio. Jazzy Joel Productions will use again, had a few units that had video translation issues, just needed to re-solder the terminals, had to do with internal polarity..

Reviews.Title: Done the job
Reviews.Author: frenchie
Reviews.Content: This done the job for what it was to be use. Service was fast I recommend this seller.This was use by my husband so I don't know much about it

Reviews.Title: great for the price....
Reviews.Author: mark elble
Reviews.Content: I prewired my home w/ Cat5e all over the place.  I've used a few of these for some security camera's.  I haven't replaced any of them yet.  Definitely not high res video, but they're doing the job.

Reviews.Title: cameras
Reviews.Author: Jason Chin Sang
Reviews.Content: it arrived to destination too late and i was not able to use them. I had to buy some from a local store at a higher price to install the cameras.

ProductInfo.Features:
6 PAIRS (12 pcs.) Mini CCTV BNC Video Balun with Lead Coax Cable
Easy installation, using the standard UTP cable system
High Performance Video Balun
ProductInfo.Name: 12x Camera CCTV BNC CAT5 Video Balun Transceiver Cable
